body.name: MEIRIYFA 3 Pin 4 Pin Fan Adapter PWM PC Chassis Cooling Fan Hub 8 Way Splitter DC12V Speed Controller with 6 Pin Power Port,Chassis Fan Pressure Regulating Governor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 26 mins
features: [Expand Fan Interfaces] - Excellent 1 to 8 splitter 8 way 4-pin and 3-pin PWM fan power supply extension hub, it provide a better power supply solution for PC computer case internal motherboard cooling fans.
[Function] - Through this hub, the governor can supply power to up to 8 fans, and the rotating potentiometer can adjust the speed of 8 PWM fans at the same time.

[Widely Compatible] - For both 4-Pin and 3-Pin fans. If the fan does not support PWM speed regulation function, the speed regulation function is invalid. The total current connected to the fan shall not exceed the maximum current value of 17A to avoid damage to the governor.

[High Performance] - The high-performance fully black circuit board is adopted, the hub is small in size and convenient to use, the material is strong and the resistance is small, which does not affect the fan performance.
[Glue Fixation] - The thickened 3M glue is used to fix it, which has strong adhesion, easily fits inside your pc case and can firmly fix the fan hub inside the chassis.
body.description: Designed for 12V 8 Way 3Pin and 4Pin Fan Hub Speed Controller Regulator. Power interface 6Pin supplies, support simultaneous starting of 8 channel 3pin or 4pin fans, which can expand one interface into 8, and the rotating potentiometer can adjust the speed of 8 PWM fans at the same time. Features: 1.This 8-way fan hub is suitable for PC desktop computer case. 2.Space Saving: It will save your space effectively and make the cable management easier, and make the inside case neat and tidy. 3.Note: The fan base supports 3pin and 4pin fans. 4.If the fan does not support PWM speed regulation function, the speed regulation function is invalid. 5.The total current connected to the fan shall not exceed the maximum current value of 17a to avoid damage to the governor. 6.Material: Metal & Plastic. 7.Product Size: 42* 29* 20mm. 8.Weight: 12g. 9.Supply Voltage: DC12V. 10.Power Supply Interface: 6Pin (2 * 3) interface. 10.Max Current: 17A. 11.Number of Fan Seats: 8Pcs. Package List: 1 x 8 Channel Hub of 3Pin and 4Pin Fan. 1 x Manual.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 62 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for multiple fans
reviews.reviewText: Used this to control four PWM fans in a server chassis that didn't need them running at mach 9000.Great value for a lil device!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for testing fans, or just as a fan hub
reviews.reviewText: Having a manual know to adjust the fan speed on a hub is great.Upto 8 fans on the little hub.The pcie 6 pin is odd, but supplies plenty of power.Red light is bright, but let's you know it is receiving power.I use it to test fans, and compare their out put without having to go to the bios to change any settings. It works well as a stand alone connected to a PSU.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent useful product
reviews.reviewText: Does exactly what we needed, control fan speed in a system without max fan speed control, cut noise down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with PWM 12V 120mm fan
reviews.reviewText: This PWM Speed Controller works as intended with 4 wired 2V 120mm fan to control the speed. With 3 pin, it stays on 100% or full power since it does not have the PWM fourth wire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Immediatly went up in smoke
reviews.reviewText: As soon as I plugged in power with no fans attached the power transistor released it's magic blue smoke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Maravilloso Producto compacto bien hecho no se ve para nada barato es robusto de buena calidad, compra 100% recomendada, regula perfectamente los fan qué sean PWM.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap external PWM functionality for your fans
reviews.reviewText: The fact that these run off a 12v 6-pin connector is amazing. You've 75w available to power your fans.Traditional motherboard headers are limited to 1A max on the 4-pin or 3-pin fan header. They can't power high rpm server grade fans.Typical use cases involve server component cooling or crypto mining.You can power these from the server PSU with a breakout board. RPM control via. PWM is using the blue knob on this board.The main reason to go for PWM control is for efficiency. Traditional fan controllers, control fan speed using a potentiometer which causes heavy power losses == heat. PWM is much cleaner and this board has implemented the same with a 555 timer based circuit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Okay, this thing is awesome. Low-cost fan control!
reviews.reviewText: Just wanted to add another vibe to the current reviews. I have literally zero complaints about this. Especially like that it doesn't use up a valuable SATA connector for power. Super simple fan controller, just plug in fans and turn a potentiometer knob to set the speed you want. It's tiny, and backed with 3M adhesive, so you can stick it anywhere in the case that's convenient. (Or just leave it randomly hanging in there like me. Windowless cases, ftw!)
